column4: I'm running 8.04 LTS and I want to upgrade to 10 LTS.  How to do that through the terminal ?
sudo aptitude update; sudo do-release-upgrade   should do it (maybe only after the first "point" release some time in june)
sudo aptitude update; sudo aptitude safe-upgrade; sudo do-release-upgrade   should do it (maybe only after the first "point" release some time in june)
stay helpful please - no place for irony here
